# Class LLMChatResponseData

LLM chat response for graph processing.

Handles both streaming and complete responses from language model interactions.

##### Index

### Methods

destroy getContent getContentStream hasCompleteContent isStreaming

## Methods

### destroy

  * destroy(): void

Cleans up resources associated with this data.

#### Returns void

Overrides BaseData.destroy




### getContent

  * getContent(): [ContentInterface](/interfaces/common_vector_messages.ContentInterface)

For non-streaming, we can still use a stream to get the content The stream will contain both text and tool calls in a single chunk

#### Returns [ContentInterface](/interfaces/common_vector_messages.ContentInterface)

The LLMChatResponse interface object




### getContentStream

  * getContentStream(): ContentStream

Gets the streaming data for streaming responses.

#### Returns ContentStream

ContentStream for streaming responses or null for non-streaming




### hasCompleteContent

  * hasCompleteContent(): boolean

Checks if this response has complete content.

#### Returns boolean

True if the response has complete content




### isStreaming

  * isStreaming(): boolean

Checks if this response is streaming.

#### Returns boolean

True if the response is streaming




### Settings

Member Visibility

  * Protected
  * Inherited
  * External
